entry.title: $2187 // NO FEE * Renovated 2BR * 6 wks free * Dishwasher/laundry $2187
entry.content:
* NO FEE * 6 weeks free * Renovated * Dishwasher & Laundry in Building * $2187++

This sun-drenched (no but really) 2BR apartment features a beautifully renovated kitchen with brand new state of the art appliances and an actual living room...

*Pets OK
*Heat & Hot Water Included

The second bedroom is on the small side (full size bed will fit) and would be perfect as a home office, guest room, or for roommates who with differing budgets.

A literal 5 mins walk to the express A at Utica Ave, 246 Bainbridge is surrounded by several fun and delicious restaurants, bars, and coffee shops: Chez Oskar, Casablanca's, Nana Ramen, Milk & Pull Bed-Stuy, Juices for Life, LunAtico....

Please contact me (text is always best) to schedule your private showing today!

++Advertised rent is net effective, factoring in 6 free weeks on a 12 month lease. Regular monthly rent is $2500++

entry.title: $2537 // Charming and Gorgeous Ft Greene 1 bedroom
entry.content: Absolutely gorgeous and charming one bedroom in the heart of Fort Greene. This place is a must see! Surrounded by restaurants, coffee shops and a block from Ft. Greene Park. Experience everything Brooklyn has to offer. Very close to C and G trains and all trains at Atlantic Terminal. This sunny apartment comes with a dishwasher, ample closet space, gorgeous bathroom with marble tiling!!! This is a wonderful place to call home. Fill the ample closet space while you gaze at your gorgeous high ceilings. This place will not last long! Make it your home today!!! Call or email me. I'm Andrew. No broker fee!!!
